name: Quick Black Bean Quesadilla
ingredients: 1 can (15 oz) black beans, drained and rinsed
steps:
In a small bowl, mix black beans, corn, red bell pepper, cilantro, cumin, and chili powder.
Heat a large non-stick skillet or griddle over medium heat.
Place one tortilla in the pan and sprinkle half with 1/2 cup of cheese.
Spoon bean mixture over the cheese, then top with another 1/2 cup of cheese.
Fold the empty half of the tortilla over the filling.
Cook for 2-3 minutes until the bottom is golden brown and crispy.
Carefully flip the quesadilla and cook for another 2-3 minutes until the other side is golden and cheese is melted.
Remove from pan and let cool for 1 minute before cutting.
Repeat with remaining tortillas and filling.
Cut each quesadilla into 3-4 wedges and serve hot with salsa, sour cream, and lime wedges on the side.
